title: Inside the world of 'secret' game developers
text:
Inside the world of 'secret' game developers 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
"Studios like us, we rely on our portfolios to get more business. And if we can't put something in our portfolio, then it costs." - SuperGen...
